```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(SPM)
```

```{r}
# read parameters
k0 <- 2
k1 <- 3
nlabel <- 3

d <- 20

N = 100

mu_Mu = 0
sigma2_Mu = 50
alpha_Lambda = 2
beta_Lambda=4

seed = 1

dg <- k0 + k1
K <- nlabel * k0 + k1
ntopic <- K

b <- 0.1
alpha <- c(3,3,3,2,2)

Ts <- T_generator(k0, k1, nlabel)

set.seed(seed)

a <- rexp(n = 1, rate = b)
rho <- gtools::rdirichlet(n = 1, alpha = alpha)

Lambda <- rgamma(n = ntopic * d, shape = alpha_Lambda, rate = beta_Lambda) %>%
  matrix(nrow = K)
Mu <- matrix(NA, nrow = K, ncol = d)
for (i in 1:K){
  for (j in 1:d){
    Mu[i, j] <- rnorm(1, mu_Mu, sqrt(sigma2_Mu / Lambda[i, j]))
  }
}
Tau <- Mu * Lambda

ntrace <- 2000
nchain <- 1
nskip <- 2
nsample <- 1000
```

#### simulating data

```{r}
dat <- document_generator_Normal(a, rho, Ts, Lambda, Tau, N, NULL, seed)
```

### SPM

#### training
```{r}
# NUTS sampler
start_time <- Sys.time()
res_nuts <- SPM_training_Normal(dat[["X"]], dat[["Y"]], Ts, b, alpha, mu_Mu, sigma2_Mu, alpha_Lambda, beta_Lambda, FALSE, ntrace, nchain, nskip, seed)
end_time <- Sys.time()
end_time - start_time
print(end_time)
```
```{r}
# Variational inference
start_time <- Sys.time()
res_VI <- SPM_training_Normal(dat[["X"]], dat[["Y"]], Ts, b, alpha, mu_Mu, sigma2_Mu, alpha_Lambda, beta_Lambda, TRUE, nskip = nskip, seed = seed)
end_time <- Sys.time()
end_time - start_time
```

#### predicting

```{r}
# use results from sampling
prediction_nuts <- SPM_predicting_Normal(dat[["X"]], res_nuts[["Lambda"]], res_nuts[["Mu"]], res_nuts[["a"]], res_nuts[["rho"]], Ts, nsample, seed, w = NULL) 
sum(prediction_nuts[["labels"]] == dat[["Y"]])
# use results from VI
prediction_VI <- SPM_predicting_Normal(dat[["X"]], res_VI[["Lambda"]], res_VI[["Mu"]], res_VI[["a"]], res_VI[["rho"]], Ts, nsample, seed, w = NULL)
sum(prediction_VI[["labels"]] == dat[["Y"]])
# use true parameters
prediction_true <- SPM_predicting_Normal(dat[["X"]], Lambda, Mu, a, rho, Ts, nsample, seed, w = NULL)
sum(prediction_true[["labels"]] == dat[["Y"]])
```

#### estimating memberships

```{r}
start_time <- Sys.time()
m_nuts <- SPM_membership_Normal(dat[["X"]], prediction_nuts[["labels"]], res_nuts[["Lambda"]], res_nuts[["Mu"]], res_nuts[["a"]], res_nuts[["rho"]], Ts,  FALSE, ntrace, nchain, nskip, seed)
end_time <- Sys.time()
end_time - start_time


start_time <- Sys.time()
m_VI <- SPM_membership_Normal(dat[["X"]], prediction_VI[["labels"]], res_VI[["Lambda"]], res_VI[["Mu"]], res_VI[["a"]], res_VI[["rho"]], Ts,  TRUE, nskip = nskip, seed = seed)
end_time <- Sys.time()
end_time - start_time

start_time <- Sys.time()
m_true <- SPM_membership_Normal(dat[["X"]], prediction_true[["labels"]], Lambda, Mu, a, rho, Ts, TRUE, nskip = nskip, seed = seed)
end_time <- Sys.time()
end_time - start_time

```
